Summary: Bright orange globe in the horizon
divs: Sighting DetailsI came to the stop sign a the end of a road and in front of me on the opposite side of the road there is an open field several acres long which gave me a clear view of the horizon. It was almost completely dark outside and off in the horizon i saw 2 bright orange globe shaped objects which were rather large in size considering how far away they were, and yes i've seen lots of planes in the sky and it looked a lot bigger than even the largest planes would appear from this far away. I sat there in my car just watching these objects floating stationary in the same place for about 3 minutes until the light given off from them started to fade and they disappeared.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There was one other sighting in Cincinnati on or around November 8th 2009
